mapper.select: SELECT A.DEPT_NO, A.DEPT_NAME, A.MEMBER_COUNT FROM (SELECT D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, COUNT(M.DEPT_NO) AS MEMBER_COUNT FROM DEPARTMENT_T D LEFT OUTER JOIN MEMBER_T M ON D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO GROUP BY D.DEPT_NO) A ORDER BY A.DEPT_NO ASC

SELECT D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, CONCAT(M.MEMBER_NAME, ' ' , J.JOB_NAME) AS DEPT_HEAD FROM DEPARTMENT_T D INNER JOIN MEMBER_T M ON D.DEPT_NO = M.DEPT_NO INNER JOIN JOB_T J ON J.JOB_NO = M.JOB_NO WHERE M.JOINED_AT = ( SELECT MIN(JOINED_AT) FROM MEMBER_T WHERE DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO AND JOB_NO = 2 ) ORDER BY D.DEPT_NO ASC
